name: Water Gun Fun
description:
It's a neighborhood water gun fun fight!!

You and five friends have chosen today to have a water gun war. Get everyone else soaked before they get you!

Spacebar for movement (toggle between forward and spin)
Enter to squirt your gun

Look for buckets to refill your water gun.
Look for towels to dry off.

(Notes: Audio has not been completed, and there are still some bugs to work out but please let me know if you've got any notes! Thanks for playing!)
